messages.title: My contract with people across Dulwich and West Norwood
messages.content: Living here for over 30 years, I know we deserve better from our MP. I will help local people first. I will be there to listen to you. I will stand up for our communities.

messages.title: HELP JONATHAN WIN!
messages.content: Jonathan Mitchell and the Liberal Democrats rely on the help of volunteers like you to build a grassroots campaign. They can't depend on the big money donations poured into the Labour and Conservative parties.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Raise the tax threshold—putting money back in your pocket by £700.
Smaller class sizes, more cash for schools and abolish university tuition fees.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Fairer future: green jobs by making Britain greener
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Invest in public transport, renewable energy and energy efficient homes.
Make politicians accountable and give you the right to sack corrupt MPs.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The Lib Dems can beat Labour here.

issues.brexitEurope: Jonathan was born in London and has lived in Dulwich for over 30 years. He worked as Eurodesk Officer covering 30 countries across Europe and has experience dealing with EU legislation and European funding streams. He believes strongly in the European ideal and makes sure everyone knows it.

politicalExperience.achievements: Covered 30 countries across Europe, dealing with EU legislation and European funding streams.
Campaigner for green issues and dedicated to preserving Dulwich Village and the Herne Hill area.

contactInformation.address: Please return to: Jonathan Mitchell, Freepost (LON 7679), London SE16 2BR

images.caption: Jonathan campaigning against Labour's third runway at Heathrow.
Jonathan with residents in Herne Hill.
Jonathan wants to make sure all children get a fair start.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Jonathan has worked to clear up graffiti and fly-tipping across the constituency.
